title: [A Touch of Zrenigotham Elegance]
[Akono's Combat Gear]
description: The broad sweep of the mahogany floor is interrupted by an oval silk area rug.  Halfway to the vaulted ceiling, a wrinkled parchment gown pattern hangs on one of the blue watered silk walls.  A glass-covered box case and a white marble shelf are pushed close together in the back of the shop.

A wrinkled parchment gown pattern hangs on one of the blue watered silk walls, and a vaulted ceiling rises overhead.  An oval silk area rug sits in one corner of a glossy mahogany floor.  There is a white marble shelf on one side of the shop and a glass-covered box case on the other.
